page.title: 13POPULATION IN PENDLESIDE
page.content: The population of the area,at the {last census was approx.662.}Of these, 25% were children up to 15 years, 65% were aged 16-60 and the rest were aged 60 or over,(about 7 were aged over 85 years)It is{mainly older people who {make up the original population.}Many of the 30-50yr age group and their families have moved into the area to work in nearby towns- Burnley,Colne Nelson and further afield. About{half {the population are in, or seeking, {employment,}in the ratio approx55%male 45%female.Some{20% are self-employed (farming,hotel/catering).{Unemployment {is about 3%}in the ratio Men 2:Women 1 {Most in employment work outside the {area.}Thus 84% of households have at least 1 car and 42% have 2 or more. {Occupations-}Manufacturing 27% Public Admin 28% Distribution & Catering 20% Construction 8% Finance 7%
